questions.questionText: We resolve conflicts in a respectful and constructive manner.
We make intentional time to connect without distractions (e.g., phones, TV, work).
I feel emotionally safe and supported in this relationship.
We communicate openly about our needs, expectations, and feelings.
When disagreements happen, we seek to understand each other's perspective.
We share meaningful experiences or traditions that deepen our connection.
We both take responsibility for our mistakes and work toward solutions.
I feel appreciated and valued by my partner.
We have healthy boundaries that protect our time, trust, and emotional wellbeing.
There are no patterns of blame, withdrawal, manipulation, or control in our relationship.
